original_text: Then in the nations where they have been carried captive, those who escape will remember me—how I have been grieved by their adulterous hearts, which have turned away from me, and by their eyes, which have lusted after their idols. They will loathe themselves for the evil they have done and for all their detestable practices.
korean_text: 너희 중에서 살아 남은 자가 사로잡혀 이방인들 중에 있어서 나를 기억하되 그들이 음란한 마음으로 나를 떠나고 음란한 눈으로 우상을 섬겨 나를 근심하게 한 것을 기억하고 스스로 한탄하리니 이는 그 모든 가증한 일로 악을 행하였음이라

sentences.original_text: where they have been carried captive

how I have been grieved by their adulterous hearts
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들의 음란한 마음 때문에 슬퍼했으니
